law.catch_line: This section applies only to single family residential real property in Anne Arundel County improved...

text.section: This section applies only to single family residential real property in Anne Arundel County improved by four or fewer single family units.
All contracts of sale for residential real property shall contain the following notice:
All local laws requiring disclosure to home buyers of information substantially similar to subsection (b) of this section prevail over the requirements of this section.
